titleStmt.title: Hesperides, or, The works both humane & divine of Robert Herrick, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Herrick, Robert, 1591-1674.
Marshall, William, fl. 1617-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Williams and Francis Eglesfield ...,

notesStmt.note: "His noble numbers, or, His pious pieces" ([2], 79 p. at end) has special t.p. with imprint: London : Printed for John Williams and Francis Eglesfield, 1647.
Includes engraved frontispiece portrait by: W. Marshall, fecit.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
